name: $::name
desc: Returns: Descriptive name for this variable.

name: $defaultValue
desc: Returns: A default, hard-coded, or user-defined value for this variable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A default, hard-coded, or user-defined value for this variable.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the variable and its purpose.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the variable and its purpose.

name: $expression
desc: Returns: The FHIRPath expression to evaluate against the fixture body. When variables are defined, only one of either expression, headerField or path must be specified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The FHIRPath expression to evaluate against the fixture body. When variables are defined, only one of either expression, headerField or path must be specified.

name: $headerField
desc: Returns: Will be used to grab the HTTP header field value from the headers that sourceId is pointing to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Will be used to grab the HTTP header field value from the headers that sourceId is pointing to.

name: $hint
desc: Returns: Displayable text string with hint help information to the user when entering a default value.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Displayable text string with hint help information to the user when entering a default value.

name: $path
desc: Returns: XPath or JSONPath to evaluate against the fixture body.  When variables are defined, only one of either expression, headerField or path must be specified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: XPath or JSONPath to evaluate against the fixture body.  When variables are defined, only one of either expression, headerField or path must be specified.

name: $sourceId
desc: Returns: Fixture to evaluate the XPath/JSONPath expression or the headerField  against within this variable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Fixture to evaluate the XPath/JSONPath expression or the headerField  against within this variable.
